title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 116 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 116 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.
lineList.cn: 我爱耶和华，因为他听了我的声音，和我的恳求。

lineList.en: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
lineList.cn: 他既向我侧耳，我一生要求告他。

lineList.en: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
lineList.cn: 死亡的绳索缠绕我，阴间的痛苦抓住我。我遭遇患难愁苦。

lineList.en: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
lineList.cn: 那时，我便求告耶和华的名，说，耶和华阿，求你救我的灵魂。

lineList.en: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.
lineList.cn: 耶和华有恩惠，有公义。我们的神以怜悯为怀。

lineList.en: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
lineList.cn: 耶和华保护愚人。我落到卑微的地步，他救了我。

lineList.en: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.
lineList.cn: 我的心哪，你要仍归安乐，因为耶和华用厚恩待你。

lineList.en: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
lineList.cn: 主阿，你救我的命，免了死亡，救我的眼，免了流泪，救我的脚，免了跌倒。

lineList.en: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.
lineList.cn: 我要在耶和华面前，行活人之路。

lineList.en: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:
lineList.cn: 我因信，所以如此说话。我受了极大的困苦。

lineList.en: I said in my haste, All men are liars.
lineList.cn: 我曾急促地说，人都是说谎的。

lineList.en: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?
lineList.cn: 我拿什么报答耶和华向我所赐的一切厚恩。

lineList.en: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我要举起救恩的杯，称扬耶和华的名。

lineList.en: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.
lineList.cn: 我要在他众民面前向耶和华还我的愿。

lineList.en: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.
lineList.cn: 在耶和华眼中，看圣民之死，极为宝贵。

lineList.en: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我真是你的仆人。我是你的仆人，是你婢女的儿子。你已经解开我的绑索。

lineList.en: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我要以感谢为祭献给你，又要求告耶和华的名。

lineList.en: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people,
lineList.cn: 我要在他众民面前，在耶和华殿的院内，

lineList.en: In the courts of the LORD's house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 在耶路撒冷当中，向耶和华还我的愿。你们要赞美耶和华。
